channel.title: Project D-Z
channel.description:
Play Beta at [url=http://dead-zone.org/play.html]Play - Dead-zone[/url]
Project D-Z is was first going to be a remake of 2008, but not anymore for now it's going to be a remake of runescape, but not a remake of like 2006 or 2007 or even 2008 it's going to be a remake of what people loved about runescape and what were the past part of it. Basicly we are just asking players what they liked about runescape and we try to add that into the game.
http://youtu.be/WTwiHeeFPDw
STUFF DONE:
[color=red]RED[/COLOR] = [color=orange]not started or little done[/COLOR]
[color=yellow]YELLOW[/COLOR] =[color=orange] Halfway done or getting close[/COLOR]
[color=Green]GREEN[/COLOR] = [color=orange]finished or almost finished[/COLOR]
[SPOILER="Stuff Done:"]
[color=Green]All F2P NPC spawns are correct.[/COLOR]
[color=red]All P2P NPC spawns are correct.[/COLOR]
[color=Green]Working quests.[/COLOR]
[color=Green]Tutorial Island.[/COLOR]
[color=Green]New ShoponNPC handler.[/COLOR]
[color=Green]Automatic Doors. (doors open and close automatically after you.)[/COLOR]
[color=Green]NPC (maxhit,defence and attack)[/COLOR]
[color=yellow]New logging system of everything.[/COLOR]
[color=red]Full Grand Exchange System.[/COLOR]
[color=yellow]Most 2008 Minigames.[/COLOR]
[color=yellow]Player projectile hitting.[/COLOR]
[/SPOILER]
MEDIA:
[SPOILER="Media:"][img]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/dzlogin.png[/img]
[img]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/tutisland.png[/img]
[img]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/tutisland1.png[/img]
[img]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/tutisland2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/thieving.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/quests.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/questfinish.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/texture.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/texture2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/npcspawns.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/equipt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/skills.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
SUPPORT BANNER + BACKGROUND:
[SPOILER="Support Banner"]Support images: [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/399934-project-d-z.html"][IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/D-Z-banner.png[/img][/URL]
[SPOILER="Background"]Background for your computer: [IMG]http://dead-zone.org/pictures/bg.jpg[/img]
[/SPOILER] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Project D-Z
item.dc:creator: @vovik_ukr vovik ukr
item.description:
@vovik_ukr wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

I wouldn’t recommend using something so “modern” with something so classic since it seems to me you’re doing some remake of some sort, I’m talking about the login interface.

it’s a 75% remake

Read full topic

item.title: Project D-Z
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

I love your graphics.

Well, good luck, your client is the highest number I support. You have some solid foundations for a good server.

Read full topic
